overview.en: BNTE (Bountie Token) Bountie is a platform for gamers in Asia to make a living while playing their favorite games. Our motto, “Get Paid To Play” envisions a world where gamers can earn Bountie Tokens on our platform through participating in tournaments. However, Bountie is not merely a gaming platform. These tokens can then be used to purchase goods and services on the online store, to participate in more tournaments, or simply converted into cash.
